name: Monogram Long-Sleeved Cotton Shirt
shortDescription: This white long-sleeved cotton shirt will elevate any look with its tone-on-tone jacquard Monogram motif resulting in a subtly textured finish. The classic tailored silhouette brings a discreet signature twist to a plain formal set and can also be layered with more graphic suits featuring a Monogram motif.
detailedDescription:
• 100% cotton
  • White
  • Regular fit
  • All-over Monogram jacquard
  • Pointy collar
  • Simple cuffs
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professional dry cleaning in hydrocarbons with KWL
  • Dry clean gently
  • Dry clean inside out in a net
  • Remove accessories before cleaning
panelInformations.introduction: To maintain the quality of your Louis Vuitton product, we recommend that you follow the care instructions:

name: Long-Sleeved Cotton Shirt
shortDescription: This pale blue cotton long-sleeved shirt is elevated with an all-over Damier Heritage jacquard. The woven motif offers a contemporary twist on a traditional Prince of Wales check with a tone-on-tone Damier incorporating vintage-inspired LV signatures. This clothing piece, which lends a signature accent to formal attire, can also be layered with a matching suit in the same motif.

name: Signature Short-Sleeved Cotton Shirt
shortDescription: This crisp white short-sleeved shirt, crafted from organic cotton poplin, is a versatile design for casual and smart occasions. It features two buttoned patch pockets on the chest, with an embossed Monogram Flower detail on the left. Mother-of-pearl effect buttons in gold-toned metal settings add a chic finishing touch.

The easy silhouette with a contemporary open collar is adorned with a bead-embroidered LV signature patch that adds a sophisticated finishing touch. This versatile piece is easy to style with the Spring-Summer 2025 Show’s smart black silhouettes, pairing with matching shorts for an effortlessly refined day-to-evening set.

name: LV x Park Seo-Bo Cotton Short-Sleeved Shirt
shortDescription: This vibrant red short-sleeved cotton shirt is from the exclusive LV x Park Seo-Bo capsule. It pays homage to the artist’s paintings with a sophisticated jacquard in mixed yarn that evokes his vertical brush strokes with a velvety 3D effect. A Park Seo-Bo tab signs the left seam, while the back is adorned with a metal LV ornament.

shortDescription: This long-sleeved Oxford shirt is crafted in cotton and elevated with a discreet tonal all-over LV Blason motif. The button closure is concealed behind a placket for an elegantly streamlined look. This clothing piece can be layered with the LV Blason jacquard Napolitana jacket and trousers as part of a contemporary mid-season suit.

  • Sky Blue
  • Regular fit

shortDescription: Crafted from lustrous metallic grey organic silk, this fluid short-sleeved shirt has a relaxed open collar silhouette for summer. It features lasso-inspired LV Ropes signatures from the Fall-Winter 2024 Show, with an LV printed on the chest and an LV Lovers motif that adorns the back. shortDescription: This fluid pyjama-inspired shirt is crafted from pure silk printed with the Fall-Winter 2024 Show’s emblematic LV Arabesque motif, inspired by traditional cowboy boots. The graphic yet delicate white-on-black motif mimics embroidery while contrasting white piping draws attention to the Western yoke and mother-of-pearl button closure. Matching pyjama trousers make a fluid silhouette for evenings.
